message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the thermal decomposition of calcium carbonate (CaCO3) to produce calcium oxide (CaO) and carbon dioxide (CO2) gas?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the thermal decomposition of calcium carbonate (CaCO3) to produce calcium oxide (CaO) and carbon dioxide (CO2) gas is:

CaCO3 (s) â†’ CaO (s) + CO2 (g)
